CautionModal.cannotComplete: Your {{confirmationType}} cannot be completed just yet.
CautionModal.tripSubmissionBlurb: Trip Submission is still missing required information, please ensure that you fill out any fields highlighted in pink to sucessfully complete it.
CautionModal.seaCreatureSubmissionBlurb:
In order to sucessfully submit your sea creature sighting, please provide a photo as well as the name of the species of sea creature in the photo as well as the date it was photographed. 
 
 Note: The location will be automatically assumed to be the dive site you opened this page from.
CautionModal.diveSiteBlurb: Your dive site submission is still missing required information, please make changes and when the indicator to turns green your submission will be ready to submit.
CautionModal.partnerAccountBlurb: Your request is still missing required information, please ensure that you fill out all four fields to sucessfully complete your request.
CautionModal.tripEditBlurb: Trip edit request is still missing required information, please ensure that you fill out any fields highlighted in pink to sucessfully complete it.

ConfirmSuccessModal.allow24HoursToProcess: Please allow up to 24 hours for it to be reviewed and approved.
ConfirmSuccessModal.checkOpeningBlurb: Check it by opening up your dive center on the map.
ConfirmSuccessModal.waitTillProccessOrBeContacted:
We are reviewing your submission. Please allow up to 24 hours for it to be reviewed and approved. 
 
 We may contact you if we need to confirm any discrepancies.

Validators.fillEmailAndPassword: Please fill out both email and password
Validators.invalidCredentials: The credentials you supplied are not valid
Validators.passwordFormat: Your password must be 6 characters or greater
Validators.accountExistMsg: You have already registered this account, please use the log in page
